concept.title: Package Files for Internet Transmission
concept.shortdesc: With the application of etransmit, you can accomplish transmitting drawing files together with their associative files through the Internet in forms of transmittal packages. The associative files included in the transmittal package are xrefs, fonts, raster images, etc.

conbody.p: Generally, all of the included files such as xrefs, raster images , and fonts will be ignored when you sending drawings to others. The receiver may not be able to display the transmitted drawing because of lacking these associative files. Using etransmit can help preventing such circumstances and decrease the error probability to a certain extent.
